entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failing test -`System.IO.Tests.File_GetSetTimes_SafeFileHandle_Pathless.WritingShouldUpdateWriteTime_After_SetLastAccessTime` on windows/x86 #95298
    9.0.0
  • Android SslStream splits messages over 2048 bytes in multiple TLS records (breaks MS-TDS protocol) #95295
  • GeneratedRegex source file RegexGenerator.g.cs not found by debugger #95293
  • Arm64: Casting a specific double value to uint32 caused an unexpected divide by zero to occur #95290
  • CA1857: hundred or thousands of build warnings from System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 on updating from .NET 7.0 to 8.0 #95289
  • [wasm] Create an optional job for HybridGlobalization on CI #95282
  • [browser] run dotnet in service worker #95277
    Future
  • [wasi] Single file build fails with AOT #95273
  • JsonConverter for {ReadOnly}Memory doesn't deserialize nulls #95267
    9.0.0
  • Invalid suppression in `TypeConverter` when loading a custom converter type #95265
  • [API Proposal]: QuicConnection.ConnectionClosed task #95263
  • Trim analyzer doesn't warn on mismatched annotations through method group conversions #95258
    9.0.0
  • mono debug component not able to re-connect after disconnect #95256
    8.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: WebProxy.GetSystemProxy #95252

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Stringbuilder.Replace(ROS oldValue, ROS newValue, int index, int count) #77837
  • (Error .Net Core 5) "Directory.GetDirectories("D:")" returns not existingDirectory #68503
    9.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests timing out #93840
    9.0.0
  • Test timeout in System.Security.Cryptography.OpenSsl.Tests on mono Amd64 OSX #94436
    9.0.0
  • [.NET 8] <PublishTrimmed> no longers works but throws build process for an infinite loop #94831
    8.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Add a `Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(ReadOnlySequence<byte>)` overload. #95185
    Future
  • Dotnet run breaks when AssemblyName ends on Service #93716
  • Authentication - An extended error has occurred. #95214
  • [corehost] Return value of library_exists_in_dir is disregarded #81355
    Future
  • .Net 7 performance regression with struct fields #87720
    Future
  • JIT: Support SIMD sized remainders in physical promotion #88318
    9.0.0
  • Environment.GetFolderPath returns different than .NET 7 on MacOS in .NET 8 #95269
  • .net core 8 not working on a brand new Mac ARM 64 #95259
    8.0.x
  • Bounds check not eliminated with enumerator #78000
    9.0.0
  • DOTNET_JitDisasm output (redirected to file) gets garbled with big dumps #95261
  • instrDescDebugInfo should store compile time handles #77789
    Future
  • Improve test coverage for TLS resume #75545
    9.0.0
  • check-labels action doesn't remove past results #91691
  • Support xcode 15 #92260
  • S1125: Remove the unucessary Boolean literal(s) codefix is producing wrong fix #95255
  • SetFileInformationByHandle uses incorrect parameters on Win32 #95096
    9.0.0
  • VS default settings drops rejit requests without failing them #95172

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Generalize check for full interruptibility #95299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove FindTypeDef api where appropriate. #95297
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Alternative fix for RuntimeHelpers.GetSubArray AOT compatibility warning #95296
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add memory randomization runs #95291
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [NO-MERGE] CoreCLR runtime instrumentation for measuring type load performance #95288
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Initial check to enable EventPipe support #95287
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve the hash function used in the `InstMethodHashTable` #95285
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: alt jit range #95283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, needs-author-action, os-wasi
  • Fix _AssemblyInTargetingPack value during servicing #95278
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add JSON null support for the built-in (ReadOnly)Memory converters. #95275
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Use managed ntlm on linux-bionic #95274
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update ILLink.Tasks.csproj #95272
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95271
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] If debugger is disconnected but vm is not exited restart the debugger thread #95270
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x
  • [mono][debugger] If debugger is disconnected but vm is not exited restart the debugger thread #95266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] Document `DebuggerSupport` for non-debug configurations #95262
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios

Merged

  • Switch SingleFileApiTests to pre-built test asset #95280
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Do not Path.Join user directory if it's "C:" #94587
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • bump-chrome-version.yml: Use `.dotnet/dotnet` if available, else use the system installed one #95286
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix performance of System.Security. Cryptography.Tests #95284
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95041
    area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AA_3A to IF_SVE_HL_3A #95127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #95163
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #95162
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #95164
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Assert bbJumpKind in BasicBlock::HasJump #95152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add README.md for System.Console #95254
    documentation, area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • Fix typo in testenv for cross-block local assertion prop #94978
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable MetricEventSourceTest on Mono on Windows x86 #95211
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Delete dead code (HashIdentity) #95246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasi] Wasi.Build.Tests - unblock single file bundle test on Windows #95268
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • Rename `library_exists_in_dir` to `file_exists_in_dir` and remove some unnecessary string allocations #95154
    area-Host
  • [browser] JSImport binding improvements #95177
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve `.Distinct().ToList()` and `.Union(e).ToList()` #95224
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid parameters in SetFileInformationByHandle #95235
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (2/N) #95233
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add PropertyBuilder implementation #95303
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [PERF] DaysInMonth optimization #95229
    community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime
  • [wasi] CI: Add AOT library tests job #95146
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Combine rootDir with relative file names #94528
    NO-MERGE, breaking-change, area-Extensions-FileSystem, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Factor SSA's DFS and profile synthesis's loop finding #95251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove questionable transformation #95249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update coreclr test run scripts #95237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • Optimize capturing lambdas in `DependencyContextExtensions` and `DependencyContextJsonReader` #92462
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Replace `pushd/popd` Calls With `-S/-B` CMake Flags in the Build System #94353
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Disallow loop increments in the top block #95227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Trimming: Add tests for handling of annotated string type names representing generic instantiations #95143
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [NO-MERGE] PR benchmark playground #95142
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • JIT: enable cross-block local assertion prop #94689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for Task.WhenAll #93619
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95183
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [browser] js string marshaling by value #95180
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #94787
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • System.Console cleanup #93828
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [RISC-V] Implement some of the NYI methods in unwindriscv64 #95128
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Floating NaN overflow test fix #94168
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Changes related to type casting errors, as well as cosmetic fixes #94198
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT] Aging stacks #95221
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • The problem with memory cache threads has been fixed #95230
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
